analyzed: gang gi phyir zhe na 'dis rgyud kyi don gsal bar shes pa de'i phyir ro //

original: dang po ni bdag po phun sum tshogs pa /
analyzed: dang po ni bdag po phun sum tshogs pa /

original: bdag po ni thams cad skye ba'i rgyu'i rang bzhin gyi phyir ro //
analyzed: bdag po ni thams cad skye ba'i rgyu'i rang bzhin gyi phyir ro //
translated: The master is the nature of the cause of the arising of everything.

original: ji ltar sa bon no //
analyzed: ji ltar sa bon no //
translated: Just like a seed.

original: gnyis pa gnas phun sum tshogs pa ni sa bon la yang bzhi dgos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyis pa gnas phun sum tshogs pa ni sa bon la yang bzhi dgos pa'i phyir ro //

original: gsum pa 'khor phun sum tshogs pa ni bzhi la yang chu la sogs pa dgos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsum pa 'khor phun sum tshogs pa ni bzhi la yang chu la sogs pa dgos pa'i phyir ro //

original: bzhi pa dus phun sum tshogs pa ni chu la sogs pa la yang gnas dgos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bzhi pa dus phun sum tshogs pa ni chu la sogs pa la yang gnas dgos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The fourth, the perfection of time, is also necessary for water, and so on, to remain.

original: lnga pa sdud pa po phun sum tshogs pa gnas skabs la yang byed pa po dgos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lnga pa sdud pa po phun sum tshogs pa gnas skabs la yang byed pa po dgos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The fifth, the perfection of the compiler, is also necessary for the agent in the situation.

original: drug pa rgyud phun sum tshogs pa 'dir byed pa po yang thams cad rdzogs pa la 'dus pa phyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: drug pa rgyud phun sum tshogs pa 'dir byed pa po yang thams cad rdzogs pa la 'dus pa phyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The sixth, the perfection of the tantra, is also necessary for the agent to be complete in this tantra.

original: 'di ltar rigs pas bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar rigs pas bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: Thus, the stage of generation is produced by reasoning.

original: de la brjod pa la sogs pa'i don gyi rim pas rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: de la brjod pa la sogs pa'i don gyi rim pas rdzogs pa'o //
translated: In that, the stage of the meaning of expression, and so on, is complete.

original: de'i phyir @325b bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rgyud dpal ye shes thig le rgyud kyi rgyal po las nyid mchog gi dbang phyug gis de skad gsungs so //

translated: Therefore, the lord of the supreme secret spoke thus in the King of Tantras, the glorious Wisdom-Essence Tantra, which has the nature of the stage of generation and completion.

original: da ni brjod pa la sogs pa'i don gyis phun sum tshogs pa drug bshad de /
analyzed: da ni brjod pa la sogs pa'i don gyis phun sum tshogs pa drug bshad de /
translated: Now, the six perfections are explained by the meaning of expression, and so on.

original: gang rgyud phun sum tshogs pa de ni brjod pa'o //
analyzed: gang rgyud phun sum tshogs pa de ni brjod pa'o //
translated: That which is the perfection of the continuum is the statement.

original: gang sdud pa po dang dus phun sum tshogs pa gnyis ni brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gang sdud pa po dang dus phun sum tshogs pa gnyis ni brjod par bya'o //
translated: That which is the perfection of the compiler and the perfection of the time are the two that are to be stated.

original: gang 'khor phun sum tshogs pa ni 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: gang 'khor phun sum tshogs pa ni 'brel pa'o //
translated: That which is the perfection of the retinue is the connection.

original: gang gnas phun sum tshogs pa ni dgos pa'o //
analyzed: gang gnas phun sum tshogs pa ni dgos pa'o //
translated: That which is the perfection of the place is the purpose.

original: gang bdag po phun sum tshogs pa de ni dgos pa'i dgos pa'o //
analyzed: gang bdag po phun sum tshogs pa de ni dgos pa'i dgos pa'o //
translated: That which is the perfection of the master is the purpose of the purpose.

original: da ni 'di la ji lta bar sgra'i rim pa gsal bar bshad de /🔽'di skad ces bya ba ni rgyud de /
analyzed: da ni 'di la ji lta bar sgra'i rim pa gsal bar bshad de / 'di skad ces bya ba ni rgyud de /
translated: Now, here the sequence of the words is explained as it is:

original: bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba ni sdud pa po'o //
analyzed: bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba ni sdud pa po'o //
translated: Thus have I heard is the continuum.🔽The compiler is at one time.

original: dus gcig na zhes bya ba ni dus so //
analyzed: dus gcig na zhes bya ba ni dus so //
translated: The time is at one time.

original: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje zhes bya ba ni bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje zhes bya ba ni bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'o //
translated: The master is the Blessed One, the vajra of the body, speech, and mind of all tathāgatas.

original: dpa' bo chen po dang dpa' mo'i dbang phyug mas yongs su bskor ba zhes bya ba ni 'khor ro //
analyzed: dpa' bo chen po dang dpa' mo'i dbang phyug mas yongs su bskor ba zhes bya ba ni 'khor ro //
translated: The retinue is the great heroes and heroines.

original: shes rab kyi bha ga la bzhugs zhes bya ba ni gnas so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi bha ga la bzhugs zhes bya ba ni gnas so //
translated: The abode is the bhaga of wisdom.

original: da ni ae wam ma y'a yi ge bzhi la dang po re zhig rnal 'byor rgyud kyi rim pas don bshad de /
analyzed: da ni ae wam ma y'a yi ge bzhi la dang po re zhig rnal 'byor rgyud kyi rim pas don bshad de /
translated: Now, the meaning is explained in the sequence of the Yoga Tantra, first of all, with regard to the four syllables evam maya.

original: rnal 'byor ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Yoga is because of the characteristic of the stage of generation.

original: rnal 'byor ma ni rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma ni rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: Yogini is the nature of completion.

original: de bas na rnal 'byor ni dang por bshad par rigs so //
analyzed: de bas na rnal 'byor ni dang por bshad par rigs so //
translated: Therefore, it is reasonable that yoga is explained first.

original: ae'i rnam pa zhes bya ba ni sa'o //
analyzed: ae'i rnam pa zhes bya ba ni sa'o //
translated: The form of e is earth.

original: sangs rgyas rin po che'i snod kyi rten gyi gzugs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rin po che'i snod kyi rten gyi gzugs so //
translated: It is the form of the support of the vessel of the jewel of the Buddha.

original: rtsub pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir sra ba'o //
analyzed: rtsub pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir sra ba'o //
translated: It is hard because of the characteristic of roughness.

original: wam gyi rnam pa ni chu'o //
analyzed: wam gyi rnam pa ni chu'o //
translated: The form of vam is water.

original: gzhan min ni sangs rgyas rin po che'i snod do //
analyzed: gzhan min ni sangs rgyas rin po che'i snod do //
translated: It is not other than the vessel of the jewel of the Buddha.

original: gsher ba'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir 'jam pa'o //
analyzed: gsher ba'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir 'jam pa'o //
translated: It is soft because of the characteristic of wetness.

original: ma zhes bya ba ni me'o //
analyzed: ma zhes bya ba ni me'o //
translated: Ma is fire.

original: nyid byang chub kyi sems rin po che'o //
analyzed: nyid byang chub kyi sems rin po che'o //
translated: It is the jewel of the mind of enlightenment.

original: tsha ba'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir shin tu 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: tsha ba'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir shin tu 'od gsal ba'o //
translated: It is very radiant because of the characteristic of heat.

original: ya'i rnam pa ni rlung ngo //
analyzed: ya'i rnam pa ni rlung ngo //
translated: The form of YA is wind.

original: yang dag pa byang chub kyi sems zla ba'i gzugs so //
analyzed: yang dag pa byang chub kyi sems zla ba'i gzugs so //
translated: The form of A is the perfect bodhicitta.

original: g-yo ba'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir sprin dang 'dra zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: g-yo ba'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir sprin dang 'dra zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The form of VA is the cloud, because it has the characteristic of movement.

original: da ni 'byung ba chen po'i bdag nyid kyi yi ge bzhi la rnam pa dang bcas pa'i lha mo'i dbang bshad de /
analyzed: da ni 'byung ba chen po'i bdag nyid kyi yi ge bzhi la rnam pa dang bcas pa'i lha mo'i dbang bshad de /
translated: Now, the four syllables that are the nature of the great elements are explained to be the goddesses with their forms.

original: ae'i rnam pa ni las kyi phyag rgya'i rang bzhin sangs rgyas spyan no //🔽thams cad bde ba 'byung ba'i rgyu sbyor thabs byed pa'o //
analyzed: ae'i rnam pa ni las kyi phyag rgya'i rang bzhin sangs rgyas spyan no // thams cad bde ba 'byung ba'i rgyu sbyor thabs byed pa'o //
translated: The form of E is Buddhalocana, who is the nature of the karma-mudra.

original: wam gyi @326a * //
analyzed: wam gyi @326a * //
translated: She is the cause of the arising of all bliss, and she performs the method of union.

original: rnam pa ni chos kyi phyag rgya'i rang bzhin m'a ma k'i'o //
analyzed: rnam pa ni chos kyi phyag rgya'i rang bzhin m'a ma k'i'o //
translated: The form of VA is Mamaki, who is the nature of the dharma-mudra.

original: sbyor thabs las byung ba'i bde ba phyi'i 'dod chags kyi me'i tsha ba las bsil bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: sbyor thabs las byung ba'i bde ba phyi'i 'dod chags kyi me'i tsha ba las bsil bar byed pa'o //
translated: She is the bliss that arises from the method of union, and she cools the heat of the fire of external passion.

original: yang na nye bar zhi bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: yang na nye bar zhi bar byed pa'o //
translated: Or, she pacifies.

original: me'i rnam pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i rang bzhin gos dkar mo'o //
analyzed: me'i rnam pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i rang bzhin gos dkar mo'o //
translated: The form of RA is Pandaravasini, who is the nature of the samaya-mudra.

original: dga' ba dang skad cig thams cad kun myong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dga' ba dang skad cig thams cad kun myong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because of the experience of all moments of joy.

original: y'a'i rnam pa ni phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin sgrol ma'o //
analyzed: y'a'i rnam pa ni phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin sgrol ma'o //
translated: The form of the syllable ya is the nature of the great seal, which is Tara.

original: spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i rmad du byung ba'i bde ba chen po gsal bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i rmad du byung ba'i bde ba chen po gsal bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it illuminates the marvelous great bliss free from all conceptual elaborations.

original: yang na khyab par byed pa'i phyir zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: yang na khyab par byed pa'i phyir zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: Or else, it is the intention that it pervades.

original: da ni de rnams la tshangs pa'i gnas dang bcas pa'i gnas kyi rim pa bshad de /
analyzed: da ni de rnams la tshangs pa'i gnas dang bcas pa'i gnas kyi rim pa bshad de /
translated: Now, the sequence of the abodes together with the brahmaviharas is explained in them.

original: byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms zhes bya ba ni tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi'o //
analyzed: byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms zhes bya ba ni tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi'o //
translated: Love, compassion, joy, and equanimity are the four brahmaviharas.

original: yang na tshangs pa'i sgra ni byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: yang na tshangs pa'i sgra ni byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: Or else, the word brahma is the thought of enlightenment.

original: spyod pa'i phyir na gnas so //
analyzed: spyod pa'i phyir na gnas so //
translated: Because of the practice, it is an abode.

original: des na tshangs pa'i gnas so //
analyzed: des na tshangs pa'i gnas so //
translated: Therefore, it is a brahma abode.

original: de la gnas ni sprul pa dang chos dang longs spyod dang bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo bzhi'o //
analyzed: de la gnas ni sprul pa dang chos dang longs spyod dang bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo bzhi'o //
translated: There, the abodes are the four wheels of emanation, dharma, enjoyment, and great bliss.

original: de la 'di ni dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: de la 'di ni dgongs pa'o //
translated: This is the intention there.

original: gang zhig ae wam ma y'a yi ge bzhi po de ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin lha mo'i rnam pa'i gzugs kyis sprul pa la sogs pa'i gnas na bzhugs so //
analyzed: gang zhig ae wam ma y'a yi ge bzhi po de ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin lha mo'i rnam pa'i gzugs kyis sprul pa la sogs pa'i gnas na bzhugs so //
translated: The four syllables of evam maya are the nature of the Thought of Enlightenment, existing in the places of emanation, etc., in the form of a goddess.

original: de yang lha'i rnam pa'i gzugs shes rab dang thabs gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin te /
analyzed: de yang lha'i rnam pa'i gzugs shes rab dang thabs gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin te /
translated: Moreover, the form of the goddess is the nature of the non-dual wisdom and means.

original: steng 'og sbyor bas zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: steng 'og sbyor bas zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: The union of above and below is the intention.

original: 'og gi gnas na yod pa ae'i rnam pa'i gzugs shes rab bo /
analyzed: 'og gi gnas na yod pa ae'i rnam pa'i gzugs shes rab bo /
translated: The form of the syllable e, existing in the lower place, is wisdom.

original: steng gi gnas na yod pa'i wam gyi rnam pa'i gzugs thabs so //
analyzed: steng gi gnas na yod pa'i wam gyi rnam pa'i gzugs thabs so //
translated: The form of the syllable vam, existing in the upper place, is means.

original: dgongs pa gang gis steng dang 'og gi sbyor ba de bshad de /
analyzed: dgongs pa gang gis steng dang 'og gi sbyor ba de bshad de /
translated: The intention is that which explains the union of above and below.

original: rten dang brten pa'i rang bzhin gyi phyir zhes dgos pa'o //
analyzed: rten dang brten pa'i rang bzhin gyi phyir zhes dgos pa'o //
translated: The purpose is because of the nature of the support and the supported.

original: gang gi tshe ae'i rnam pa'i gzugs shes rab rten yod pa de'i tshe thabs la ngal so'i gnas yod do //
analyzed: gang gi tshe ae'i rnam pa'i gzugs shes rab rten yod pa de'i tshe thabs la ngal so'i gnas yod do //
translated: When the form of the syllable e, which is wisdom, is the support, then the means has a place of rest.

original: thabs ngal so bas thabs bskyed pa dang gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thabs ngal so bas thabs bskyed pa dang gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: The means, having rested, will generate and abide in the means.

original: bskyed pa la ni rdzogs pa yang dag par shes so //
analyzed: bskyed pa la ni rdzogs pa yang dag par shes so //
translated: In the generation, the perfection is perfectly known.

original: de lta ma yin na gzhan gang nas 'ong /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na gzhan gang nas 'ong /
translated: Otherwise, from where else?

original: gang gi phyir zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is it so?

original: rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin nam mkha' bzhin du chos kyi sku'i rang gi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin nam mkha' bzhin du chos kyi sku'i rang gi ngo bo'o //
translated: The nature of perfection is like space, the essence of the Dharmakaya.

original: de ni skyed pa'i rten med pas mi shes so //
analyzed: de ni skyed pa'i rten med pas mi shes so //
translated: That is not known because there is no support for generation.

original: ji ltar mun nag nang du mar me med par mu tig la sogs pa mi rnyed ces 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar mun nag nang du mar me med par mu tig la sogs pa mi rnyed ces 'brel pa'o //
translated: Just as in the darkness, without a lamp, pearls, etc. are not found.

original: da ni @326b ma'i sgra'i don bshad de /
analyzed: da ni @326b ma'i sgra'i don bshad de /
translated: Now, the meaning of the word MA is explained.

original: ma y'a zhes bya ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: ma y'a zhes bya ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
translated: MA is called the Sambhogakaya.

original: ma'i rnam pa'i bde ba chen po'i grub pa 'od kyi bdag nyid byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: ma'i rnam pa'i bde ba chen po'i grub pa 'od kyi bdag nyid byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: The form of MA is the great bliss of accomplishment, the nature of light, the thought of enlightenment.

original: y'a'i rnam pa ni rang bzhin gyi rlung gi mtshan nyid des mnan pa g-yo ba med par byas pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: y'a'i rnam pa ni rang bzhin gyi rlung gi mtshan nyid des mnan pa g-yo ba med par byas pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The form of YA is the nature of the wind, which is pressed down by it, and the meaning is that it is made motionless.

original: g-yo ba med pas thams cad dga' ba skad cig ros yongs su rgyas pa de'i phyir longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: g-yo ba med pas thams cad dga' ba skad cig ros yongs su rgyas pa de'i phyir longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
translated: Since it is unmoving, it is the complete satisfaction of all with the taste of the instant, and therefore it is the body of complete enjoyment.

original: yang na dngos po thams cad kyi ro gcig pa'i rang bzhin gyi phyir longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yang na dngos po thams cad kyi ro gcig pa'i rang bzhin gyi phyir longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Or else, it is called the body of complete enjoyment because it is the nature of the single taste of all things.

original: yang na ma'i rnam pa ni srog / y'a'i rnam pa ni nye ba'i srog / de dag sbyor bas mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: yang na ma'i rnam pa ni srog / y'a'i rnam pa ni nye ba'i srog / de dag sbyor bas mnyam pa'o //
translated: Moreover, the form of ma is life, and the form of ya is vitality. Their union is equality.

original: gang zhig mnyam pa de ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: gang zhig mnyam pa de ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba dang bral ba'o //
translated: That which is equal is free from coming and going.

original: gang zhig srog de ni sum cu rtsa gnyis phyi nang chu tshod sum cu rtsa gnyis dbyu gu drug cu rtsa bzhi thun tshod brgyad kyi phyed kyi bar du brgyad brgyas lhag pa'i stong phrag bcu snang ba mched pa'i gzugs kyis bde ba chen po'i longs spyod myong
analyzed: gang zhig srog de ni sum cu rtsa gnyis phyi nang chu tshod sum cu rtsa gnyis dbyu gu drug cu rtsa bzhi thun tshod brgyad kyi phyed kyi bar du brgyad brgyas lhag pa'i stong phrag bcu snang ba mched pa'i gzugs kyis bde ba chen po'i longs spyod myong
translated: That life is the thirty-two external and internal hours, the sixty-four half periods, and the eight periods, for the sake of experiencing the enjoyment of great bliss with the form of the arising of the light that is more than eight thousand in the interval.

original: ba'i don du snying ga nas 'ongs nas khyad par 'byung ngo //
analyzed: ba'i don du snying ga nas 'ongs nas khyad par 'byung ngo //
translated: Having come from the heart, it arises as a distinction.

original: phyed kyi snang ba thob pa'i gzugs kyis lte ba'i dbus nas 'ongs nas gyen du 'byung ngo //
analyzed: phyed kyi snang ba thob pa'i gzugs kyis lte ba'i dbus nas 'ongs nas gyen du 'byung ngo //
translated: The form that has attained half of the appearance comes from the center of the navel and arises upward.

original: de dag 'byung bas gang zhig skad cig gis bde ba chen po chu skyes kyi snying por 'od rab chen po'i snang ba de ni ma y'a zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de dag 'byung bas gang zhig skad cig gis bde ba chen po chu skyes kyi snying por 'od rab chen po'i snang ba de ni ma y'a zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: By their arising, that which is the appearance of the great light in the essence of the great bliss of the lotus in an instant is the meaning of māyā.

original: da ni thos pa'i sgra'i don bshad de /
analyzed: da ni thos pa'i sgra'i don bshad de /
translated: Now, the meaning of the sound of hearing is explained.

original: thos pa zhes bya ba ni rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: thos pa zhes bya ba ni rdzogs pa'o //
translated: “ Hearing” is complete.

original: ci zhig sprul pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: ci zhig sprul pa'i sku'o //
translated: What is emanated is the nirmāṇakāya.

original: gang las rdzogs pa de nyid don bshad de /
analyzed: gang las rdzogs pa de nyid don bshad de /
translated: From what is complete, that very meaning is explained.

original: bde ba chen po grub pa'i 'od kyi bdag nyid gang gi tshe grub pa zla ba'i rnam pas yongs su smin pa de'i tshe yongs su smin pa'i dus su rlung dang me'i khong du chud pas mtshan dang dpe byad ldan pa'i sku chu las nya bzhin bzhengs par
analyzed: bde ba chen po grub pa'i 'od kyi bdag nyid gang gi tshe grub pa zla ba'i rnam pas yongs su smin pa de'i tshe yongs su smin pa'i dus su rlung dang me'i khong du chud pas mtshan dang dpe byad ldan pa'i sku chu las nya bzhin bzhengs par
translated: When the essence of the light of the accomplishment of great bliss is completely ripened in the form of the moon, at that time, at the time of complete ripening, the form endowed with the major and minor marks arises like a fish from water through the realization of wind and fire.

original: rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of “complete.”

original: yang na thos pa de ni gzhan min rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: yang na thos pa de ni gzhan min rdzogs pa'o //
translated: Or, that hearing is not other than complete.

original: ci zhig de rang don bshad de /
analyzed: ci zhig de rang don bshad de /
translated: What is that? It is one's own aim.

original: dngos po thams cad la snang ba thob pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad la snang ba thob pa'o //
translated: One obtains the appearance of all things.

original: snang ba zhes bya ba ni tha mar grol ba'i lta ba'o //
analyzed: snang ba zhes bya ba ni tha mar grol ba'i lta ba'o //
translated: The appearance is the view of liberation at the end.

original: thob pa ni de rang len pa /
analyzed: thob pa ni de rang len pa /
translated: Obtaining is taking that up for oneself.

original: yang na gzung ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yang na gzung ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Or, it means grasping.

original: da ni 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba'i tshigs bcad la sbyor ba drug gi don gyis ji ltar rang bzhin bshad de /
analyzed: da ni 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba'i tshigs bcad la sbyor ba drug gi don gyis ji ltar rang bzhin bshad de /
translated: Now, in the verse beginning, Thus have I heard, the nature is explained by the meaning of the six applications.

original: ae'i rnam pa dngos po'i rnam par shes pa dngos po thams cad kyi rten gyi phyir ro //
analyzed: ae'i rnam pa dngos po'i rnam par shes pa dngos po thams cad kyi rten gyi phyir ro //
translated: The form of e is the consciousness of things, because it is the basis of all things.🔽Or,

original: yang na @327a * //
analyzed: yang na @327a * //
translated: it is the path.

original: lam mo // wam gyi rnam pa rten gyi rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: lam mo // wam gyi rnam pa rten gyi rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: The form of vaṃ is the consciousness of the basis.

original: thob pa dang ma thob pa rnams la ngal so ba'i sa'o //
analyzed: thob pa dang ma thob pa rnams la ngal so ba'i sa'o //
translated: It is the resting place for obtaining and not obtaining.

original: yang na rgyur gyur pa'o //
analyzed: yang na rgyur gyur pa'o //
translated: Or, it is the cause.

original: rgyu 'dir rnyed pa la 'byung ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rgyu 'dir rnyed pa la 'byung ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This cause is the meaning of the term arising from the discovery of the object.

original: ma'i rnam pa ni ye shes kyi rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: ma'i rnam pa ni ye shes kyi rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: The form of ma is the consciousness of pristine consciousness.

original: thob pa'i bde ba la sogs pa skyabs sbyin no //
analyzed: thob pa'i bde ba la sogs pa skyabs sbyin no //
translated: The bliss of attainment, etc. is the giver of refuge.

original: yang na 'dus par byed do //
analyzed: yang na 'dus par byed do //
translated: Or else, it is the one who assembles.

original: ya'i rnam pa ni rnam par 'byed pa'i rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: ya'i rnam pa ni rnam par 'byed pa'i rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: The form of ya is the discriminating consciousness.

original: sbas pa la bye brag byed do //
analyzed: sbas pa la bye brag byed do //
translated: It is the one who makes distinctions in the hidden.

original: yang na 'gro bar 'dod pa ni mi ster ba'o //
analyzed: yang na 'gro bar 'dod pa ni mi ster ba'o //
translated: Or else, the one who does not give to those who desire to go.

original: shro'i rnam pa ni mtha'i rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: shro'i rnam pa ni mtha'i rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: The form of śro is the consciousness of the end.

original: grangs med pa'i 'jig rten la yod pa'i srog gi grags pa'o //
analyzed: grangs med pa'i 'jig rten la yod pa'i srog gi grags pa'o //
translated: It is the fame of life in the countless worlds.

original: yang na khyab par byed pa'o //
analyzed: yang na khyab par byed pa'o //
translated: Or else, it is the pervader.

original: de'i rnam pa ni snang ba'i rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rnam pa ni snang ba'i rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: Its form is the illuminating consciousness.

original: mi gsal ba'i bde ba'i ye shes kun la gsal bar byed do //
analyzed: mi gsal ba'i bde ba'i ye shes kun la gsal bar byed do //
translated: The unclear bliss-gnosis illuminates all.

original: yang na spong bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yang na spong bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Or else, it has the meaning of the one who abandons.

original: da ni dus gcig na zhes pa'i don bshad de /
analyzed: da ni dus gcig na zhes pa'i don bshad de /
translated: Now, the meaning of “at one time” is explained.

original: dus kyi sgra ni gnas skabs so //
analyzed: dus kyi sgra ni gnas skabs so //
translated: The word “time” is a state.

original: yang na yongs su smin pa'i dus so //
analyzed: yang na yongs su smin pa'i dus so //
translated: Or else, it is the time of complete ripening.

original: de yang 'dir gnyis su dbye na ni shin tu dus dang / ngan dus so //
analyzed: de yang 'dir gnyis su dbye na ni shin tu dus dang / ngan dus so //
translated: Moreover, if it is divided here into two, it is the very time and the bad time.

original: shin tu dus ni sna'i 'phar ba gnyis kyi 'ong ba /
analyzed: shin tu dus ni sna'i 'phar ba gnyis kyi 'ong ba /
translated: The bad time is the going of the two pulsations of the nose.

original: ngan dus ni de bzhin du 'gro ba shin tu dus kyis ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'bras bu rnyed do //
analyzed: ngan dus ni de bzhin du 'gro ba shin tu dus kyis ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'bras bu rnyed do //
translated: By the very good time one obtains the desired fruit.

original: ngan pa'i dus kyis mi rnyed do //🔽yang na dus ni dga' ba gnyis mnyam par 'byung ngo //
analyzed: ngan pa'i dus kyis mi rnyed do // yang na dus ni dga' ba gnyis mnyam par 'byung ngo //
translated: By the bad time one does not obtain it.🔽Or else, the time is the simultaneous arising of the two joys.

original: yang na gnyis kyi rin po che kha sprad pa'o //
analyzed: yang na gnyis kyi rin po che kha sprad pa'o //
translated: Or else, the two jewels are joined.

original: yang na bla ma'i man ngag gis rin po che'i ske'i nang gi lte ba'i rtsa bar bzung ba'o //
analyzed: yang na bla ma'i man ngag gis rin po che'i ske'i nang gi lte ba'i rtsa bar bzung ba'o //
translated: Or else, by the guru's instruction, one holds the jewel in the navel cakra of the throat.

original: de nyid gzung ba tsam gyis ni gang zhig zla ba nyi ma'i stan 'dzums pa de ni gcig ces bya ba'i don to //🔽yang na gang zhig 'gro ba dang 'ong ba dang bral ba de ni gcig go //
analyzed: de nyid gzung ba tsam gyis ni gang zhig zla ba nyi ma'i stan 'dzums pa de ni gcig ces bya ba'i don to // yang na gang zhig 'gro ba dang 'ong ba dang bral ba de ni gcig go //
translated: By merely holding that, the moon and sun seats are closed, which is the meaning of one.🔽Or else, that which is free from coming and going is one.

original: yang na gang zhig grags pa dang bral ba de ni gcig go //
analyzed: yang na gang zhig grags pa dang bral ba de ni gcig go //
translated: Or else, that which is free from fame is one.

original: yang na gang zhig chags pa dang bral ba de dag gcig tu gyur pa mar gyi nang du mar bzhin du de ni dus gcig brjod ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yang na gang zhig chags pa dang bral ba de dag gcig tu gyur pa mar gyi nang du mar bzhin du de ni dus gcig brjod ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: Or, that which is free from attachment is one, like butter in milk. The meaning of the verse is that it is expressed as one.

original: de'i skad cig la phyis bshad pa'i shes rab kyi bha ga la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjer bzhugs so //
analyzed: de'i skad cig la phyis bshad pa'i shes rab kyi bha ga la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjer bzhugs so //
translated: In that moment, the Bhagavān abides in the bhaga of wisdom, which will be explained later, as the vajra body, speech, and mind of all tathāgatas.

original: chags pa la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i dra ba bcom pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: chags pa la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i dra ba bcom pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He is the Bhagavān because he has destroyed the net of afflictions such as attachment and so on.

original: yang na dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: yang na dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Or, he is the Bhagavān because he possesses the qualities of Īśvara and so on.

original: yang na srid pa'i mun nag bcom pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: yang na srid pa'i mun nag bcom pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Or, he is the Bhagavān because he has destroyed the darkness of existence.

original: yang na srid pa'i rgya mtsho @327b gting ring ba'i zab pa chags pa la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i chu srin gyis khyab pa sgrol bar byed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: yang na srid pa'i rgya mtsho @327b gting ring ba'i zab pa chags pa la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i chu srin gyis khyab pa sgrol bar byed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Or, he is the Bhagavān because he liberates from the deep ocean of existence, which is pervaded by the crocodile of afflictions such as attachment and so on.

original: yang na stong pa nyid kyi bha ga la bzhugs pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: yang na stong pa nyid kyi bha ga la bzhugs pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das so //
translated: Or else, he is the Transcendent Lord because he abides in the bhaga of emptiness.

original: bzhugs bzhin du gang gi phyir 'gro ba dang mi 'gro ba dbyer med pas gzigs pa de'i phyir thams cad do //
analyzed: bzhugs bzhin du gang gi phyir 'gro ba dang mi 'gro ba dbyer med pas gzigs pa de'i phyir thams cad do //
translated: And he is all because, while abiding, he sees the world and the non-world as undifferentiated.

original: ji ltar sus kyang ma gshegs pa de ltar gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ji ltar sus kyang ma gshegs pa de ltar gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: He is the Tathagata because he goes thus, that is, just as he came.

original: yang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgras rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de rnams kyi gang zhig sku gsung thugs de ni rdo rje'o //
analyzed: yang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgras rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de rnams kyi gang zhig sku gsung thugs de ni rdo rje'o //
translated: Or else, by the word Tathagata, those [Buddhas] Vairocana and so forth are meant. His body, speech, and mind are the vajra.

original: rdo rje ni rang bzhin bde ba'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: rdo rje ni rang bzhin bde ba'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: The vajra is the nature, which is characterized by bliss.

original: bde ba'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir mi shigs pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir mi shigs pa'o //
translated: Because it is characterized by bliss, it is indestructible.

original: yang na thams cad kyi sgras 'byung ba chen po las skyes pa phung po la sogs de ni ji ltar sngon 'ongs pa de bzhin du 'gro ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yang na thams cad kyi sgras 'byung ba chen po las skyes pa phung po la sogs de ni ji ltar sngon 'ongs pa de bzhin du 'gro ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Or else, by the word all, the great elements, the aggregates, and so forth are meant. He goes thus, just as he came. This is the meaning of the Tathagata.

original: de rnams la gang zhig sku de ni sku'i mtshan nyid kyis 'das so //
analyzed: de rnams la gang zhig sku de ni sku'i mtshan nyid kyis 'das so //
translated: Among those, that body is transcendent due to the characteristic of the body.

original: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pas skyon mi bgyid pa'i phyir lus po la rgas pa la sogs pa yod pa'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pas skyon mi bgyid pa'i phyir lus po la rgas pa la sogs pa yod pa'o //
translated: Since the afflictive obstructions do not function, there is aging and so on in the body.

original: de med pas lus po yod pa ni yang med de /
analyzed: de med pas lus po yod pa ni yang med de /
translated: Since that does not exist, the body also does not exist.

original: ji ltar chu'i zla ba bzhin du chu zla'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir de nyid rdo rje'o //
analyzed: ji ltar chu'i zla ba bzhin du chu zla'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir de nyid rdo rje'o //
translated: Like the moon in the water, since it has the characteristic of the moon in the water, that is the vajra.

original: de yang chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de yang chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: That is also the nature of the dharmadhātu.

original: chos rnams kyi dbyings chos kyi dbyings bya ba chos kyi sgra ni sku gsung thugs /
analyzed: chos rnams kyi dbyings chos kyi dbyings bya ba chos kyi sgra ni sku gsung thugs /
translated: The dhātu of phenomena is called the dharmadhātu. The term phenomena refers to the body, voice, and mind.

original: dbyings kyi sgra ni sa bon sems las byung ba /
analyzed: dbyings kyi sgra ni sa bon sems las byung ba /
translated: The term dhātu refers to the seed, the mind.

original: yang na nam mkha'/
analyzed: yang na nam mkha'/
translated: Alternatively, it is space.

original: de nyid shes rab kyi pha rol phyin ma /
analyzed: de nyid shes rab kyi pha rol phyin ma /
translated: That is the perfection of wisdom.

original: de'i bha ga ni stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i bha ga ni stong pa nyid do //
translated: Her bhaga is emptiness.

original: de yang shin tu gting ring ba zab pa tshad med bsam du med do //
analyzed: de yang shin tu gting ring ba zab pa tshad med bsam du med do //
translated: Moreover, it is very deep, profound, immeasurable, and inconceivable.

original: yang na mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'dzin pa'i gzhi bcom pa'i phyir bha ga'o //
analyzed: yang na mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'dzin pa'i gzhi bcom pa'i phyir bha ga'o //
translated: Alternatively, since the basis of grasping nirvāṇa is destroyed, it is a bhaga.

original: de la bzhugs pa su zhig bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de la bzhugs pa su zhig bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po zhes bya'o //
translated: Who abides there? The Blessed One, the great vajra-holder of the body, speech, and mind of all tathāgatas.

original: da ni 'di skad bdag gis thos pa la sogs pa nas bzhugs pa yan chad gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs pa'i don gyis ji lta ba'i rang bzhin bshad de gang gi phyir zhe na /
analyzed: da ni 'di skad bdag gis thos pa la sogs pa nas bzhugs pa yan chad gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs pa'i don gyis ji lta ba'i rang bzhin bshad de gang gi phyir zhe na /
translated: Now, from Thus have I heard up to abiding, the meaning of the abode, neighboring abode, and so on will be explained as it is. Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la ae wam gyi rnam pa gnas pa de'i phyir gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs pa'i don gyis nges par smra bar bya'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la ae wam gyi rnam pa gnas pa de'i phyir gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs pa'i don gyis nges par smra bar bya'o //
translated: Because the Blessed One, the great vajra-holder, abides in the form of E-VAM, therefore it should be spoken of with the meaning of the abode, neighboring abode, and so on.

original: zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga la sogs pa nas sems can gyi phyogs la snying rje med /
analyzed: zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga la sogs pa nas sems can gyi phyogs la snying rje med /
translated: From Candrakīrti and so on, there is no compassion for sentient beings.

original: @328a * // yod na 'di skad bdag gis la sogs pa ci'i don gyi phyir yang dag par ma bshad /
analyzed: @328a * // yod na 'di skad bdag gis la sogs pa ci'i don gyi phyir yang dag par ma bshad /
translated: If there were, why would they not explain the meaning of Thus have I heard and so on?

original: gang zhig bshad pa de ni rgyud rang gi rim pa bor nas gal te 'dus pa la gnas la sogs pa'i don ma bshad ces dgongs nas de la smra'o //
analyzed: gang zhig bshad pa de ni rgyud rang gi rim pa bor nas gal te 'dus pa la gnas la sogs pa'i don ma bshad ces dgongs nas de la smra'o //
translated: If one explains that, then if one thinks that the meaning of gathering and so on is not explained by abandoning the stages of the tantra itself, then one should say that.

original: gang 'dus pa ma bshad na de ni 'dus pa chen po la bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bshad dam ci /
analyzed: gang 'dus pa ma bshad na de ni 'dus pa chen po la bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bshad dam ci /
translated: If it is not explained in the gathering, then is it not explained by the Bhagavān in the great gathering?

original: gal te rgyud mthong ba yin na de lta yin na thos pa che ba'i mtshan nyid gang /
analyzed: gal te rgyud mthong ba yin na de lta yin na thos pa che ba'i mtshan nyid gang /
translated: If it is seen in the tantra, then what is the characteristic of great hearing?

original: thos pa chung ba des 'grel pa la sogs pa mi bya /
analyzed: thos pa chung ba des 'grel pa la sogs pa mi bya /
translated: One with little hearing should not compose commentaries and so on.

original: mang po smra bas ci bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa'i go rims kyis bdag gi der don bshad de /
analyzed: mang po smra bas ci bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa'i go rims kyis bdag gi der don bshad de /
translated: What is the use of much talk? The meaning of that should be explained by me in the order explained by the Bhagavān.

original: 'di skad ces bya ba'i gnas dngos po thams cad kyi rten gyi phyir /
analyzed: 'di skad ces bya ba'i gnas dngos po thams cad kyi rten gyi phyir /
translated: Thus it is said: The abode called 'thus' is the basis of all things.

original: yang na 'ongs pa rnams la gnas bgyid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang na 'ongs pa rnams la gnas bgyid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Or it is because it serves as a dwelling for those who have come.

original: bdag gis zhes bya ba ni nye ba'i gnas /
analyzed: bdag gis zhes bya ba ni nye ba'i gnas /
translated: By me is the proximate abode.

original: gnas pa la 'phel bar byed pa'i phyir yang na yongs su smin par byed pas so //
analyzed: gnas pa la 'phel bar byed pa'i phyir yang na yongs su smin par byed pas so //
translated: Or it is because it causes increase in the abode, or because it brings to maturity.

original: thos zhes bya ba ni zhing thams cad skye ba'i rgyu'i phyir yang na rdzogs par byed pas so //🔽dus gcig ces pa ni nye ba'i zhing thams cad la thams cad yan lag gis thams cad rgyas par byed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: thos zhes bya ba ni zhing thams cad skye ba'i rgyu'i phyir yang na rdzogs par byed pas so // dus gcig ces pa ni nye ba'i zhing thams cad la thams cad yan lag gis thams cad rgyas par byed pa'i phyir /
translated: The word heard means that all the fields are the cause of arising, or else it is because it is perfected.🔽The word at one time means that all the branches of all the proximate fields are expanded, or else it is because it pervades.🔽The word all means that all the branches of all the proximate fields are expanded, or else it is because it pervades.

translated: Although it is not the way of the teaching for the sake of esoteric instructions, still, since it is done for the sake of fortunate sentient beings, I will write it in the treatise.

original: mchog gi dga' ba 'di med na de la ji ltar chad pa'i dga' ba las rang bzhin dga' ba rnyed de /
analyzed: mchog gi dga' ba 'di med na de la ji ltar chad pa'i dga' ba las rang bzhin dga' ba rnyed de /
translated: If this supreme joy does not exist, how can one find natural joy from the joy of cessation?

original: chad pa'i dga' ba zhes bya ba ni dga' ba'i dngos po las rlag pa srog dang bral ba'i dngos po 'thob bo //
analyzed: chad pa'i dga' ba zhes bya ba ni dga' ba'i dngos po las rlag pa srog dang bral ba'i dngos po 'thob bo //
translated: What is called the joy of cessation is the attainment of an object that is devoid of the object of joy, an object devoid of life.

original: ji ltar snum zad pa'i mar me'i sdong bu de ni 'dod pa'i dngos po rnyed pa yun ring po yod dam ci /
analyzed: ji ltar snum zad pa'i mar me'i sdong bu de ni 'dod pa'i dngos po rnyed pa yun ring po yod dam ci /
translated: How long does the wick of a lamp exist after the oil is exhausted?

original: chad pa'i dga' ba yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: chad pa'i dga' ba yang de bzhin no //
translated: The joy of cessation is also like that.

original: med pas na gcig pu chad pa'i mun nag go //
analyzed: med pas na gcig pu chad pa'i mun nag go //
translated: Since it does not exist, it is the darkness of the solitary cessation.

original: mun nag la shin tu phra mo'i dngos po sus rnyed par nus /
analyzed: mun nag la shin tu phra mo'i dngos po sus rnyed par nus /
translated: Who can find the most subtle thing in the dark?

original: de bas na mchog gi dga' ba'i mar me dgos so //
analyzed: de bas na mchog gi dga' ba'i mar me dgos so //
translated: Therefore, the lamp of supreme joy is necessary.

original: gang gi phra mo'i dngos po rang bzhin dga' ba rnyed pa zhes bdag gis dgos pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi phra mo'i dngos po rang bzhin dga' ba rnyed pa zhes bdag gis dgos pa'o //
translated: I have the need to find the most subtle thing, which is natural joy.

original: ji ltar rnyed pa'i man ngag gi don bdag gis bshad de /
analyzed: ji ltar rnyed pa'i man ngag gi don bdag gis bshad de /
translated: I will explain the meaning of the intimate instruction of how to find it.

original: dang po srub dang bsrub thabs kyi gtum mo'i sbyor ba las rdo rje rtsa bar dga' ba tshor bar bya'o //
analyzed: dang po srub dang bsrub thabs kyi gtum mo'i sbyor ba las rdo rje rtsa bar dga' ba tshor bar bya'o //
translated: First, from the yoga of the caṇḍālī of the method of churning and the churned, one should feel joy in the vajra base.

original: rtsa ba las rke ru mchog gi dga' ba rke las snying gar chad pa'i dga' ba de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyogs so //
analyzed: rtsa ba las rke ru mchog gi dga' ba rke las snying gar chad pa'i dga' ba de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyogs so //
translated: From the base to the throat, supreme joy; from the throat to the heart, the joy of cessation. That is the side of the stage of generation.

original: rdzogs pa'i phyogs su snying ga'i gnas su bde ba chen po sleb pa tsam gyis bla ma'i man ngag las de ru gang zhig gzung ba de ni mchog tu dga' ba'o //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i phyogs su snying ga'i gnas su bde ba chen po sleb pa tsam gyis bla ma'i man ngag las de ru gang zhig gzung ba de ni mchog tu dga' ba'o //
translated: In the stage of completion, merely arriving at the place of the heart, the great bliss, from the guru’s intimate instructions, that which is held there is supreme joy.

original: cung zad tsam gyen du 'gro bar byed pa rang bzhin dga' ba'o //
analyzed: cung zad tsam gyen du 'gro bar byed pa rang bzhin dga' ba'o //
translated: Moving up just a little, natural joy.

original: de ltar min na rang bzhin dga' ba thob par mi 'gyur zhes bdag gis dgongs so //🔽rdo rje zhes @330a * //
analyzed: de ltar min na rang bzhin dga' ba thob par mi 'gyur zhes bdag gis dgongs so // rdo rje zhes @330a * //
translated: Otherwise, one does not attain the innate joy.

original: bya ba rdo rje 'bar ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin spros pa thams cad lhan cig skyes pa'i phyag dang mdog la sogs pa bral ba'i 'od kyi ngo bo'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bya ba rdo rje 'bar ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin spros pa thams cad lhan cig skyes pa'i phyag dang mdog la sogs pa bral ba'i 'od kyi ngo bo'i phyir ro //
translated: The vajra is the nature of the essence of the blazing vajra, because of the absence of all elaborations, the innate, the absence of hands, color, etc., and the nature of the light.

original: dpa' bo chen po zhes bya ba ni dpa' bo chen po byang chub kyi sems thig le'i ngo bo nyid du zhu ba dang chad pa dang bral ba'i phyir thig le'i sgras bshad pa'o //
analyzed: dpa' bo chen po zhes bya ba ni dpa' bo chen po byang chub kyi sems thig le'i ngo bo nyid du zhu ba dang chad pa dang bral ba'i phyir thig le'i sgras bshad pa'o //
translated: The great hero is explained by the word drop, because of the melting into the nature of the drop of the great hero, the bodhicitta, and because of the absence of interruption.

original: dpa' bo chen po'i dbang phyug ma ni myos pa'i rang bzhin gtso //
analyzed: dpa' bo chen po'i dbang phyug ma ni myos pa'i rang bzhin gtso //
translated: The great hero’s lady is the chief of the nature of intoxication.

original: bde ba thams cad la sogs pa khong du chud pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bde ba thams cad la sogs pa khong du chud pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the comprehension of all bliss, etc.

original: yongs su bskor ba zhes pa ni chad pa'i dga' ba'i mtshan nyid kyi yan lag thams cad chad pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yongs su bskor ba zhes pa ni chad pa'i dga' ba'i mtshan nyid kyi yan lag thams cad chad pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The complete circle is because of the absence of interruption of all the branches characterized by interrupted joy.

original: de la 'di ni dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: de la 'di ni dgongs pa'o //
translated: This is the intended meaning there.

original: chad pa'i mtshan ma'i mtshan nyid dga' ba ni nyin mo'i mtshan nyid mtshan mo 'das pas nyin mor 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chad pa'i mtshan ma'i mtshan nyid dga' ba ni nyin mo'i mtshan nyid mtshan mo 'das pas nyin mor 'gyur ro //
translated: The characteristic of the sign of cessation is joy, which is the characteristic of day, because night has passed.

original: nyin mo'i yan lag thams cad 'od dang ldan pa mchog gi dga' ba mthong ba mdzes pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: nyin mo'i yan lag thams cad 'od dang ldan pa mchog gi dga' ba mthong ba mdzes pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: All the parts of the day are radiant, and the supreme joy is seen to be beautiful.

original: sa zhes bya ba ni shes rab aom dha'i rang bzhin sangs rgyas rin po che'i snod ro thams cad dang / reg bya la sogs pa la gzhi'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sa zhes bya ba ni shes rab aom dha'i rang bzhin sangs rgyas rin po che'i snod ro thams cad dang / reg bya la sogs pa la gzhi'i phyir ro //
translated: The earth is the nature of wisdom, the vessel of the precious Buddha, the basis of all tastes, textures, and so forth.

original: yang na ngal so ba zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: yang na ngal so ba zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
translated: Or it is intended to mean resting place.

original: bha ga zhes bya ba ni tshul gyi ngo bo nyid longs spyod tha ma'i dngos po bcom pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bha ga zhes bya ba ni tshul gyi ngo bo nyid longs spyod tha ma'i dngos po bcom pa'i phyir /
translated: The bhaga is the nature of the method, the supreme enjoyment, because it conquers the state of the ultimate.

original: yang na 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ro myong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang na 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ro myong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Or it is because of experiencing the transcendent taste.

original: bzhugs zhes bya ba ni nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis bzhugs so //
analyzed: bzhugs zhes bya ba ni nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis bzhugs so //
translated: Abides means abiding by its own characteristic.

original: phyi'i chags pa la sogs pa ma tshor ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyi'i chags pa la sogs pa ma tshor ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it does not feel external attachment and so forth.

original: ji ltar skyes bu gnyid du 'gro ba ci yang mi tshor ro //
analyzed: ji ltar skyes bu gnyid du 'gro ba ci yang mi tshor ro //
translated: Just as a person going to sleep does not feel anything.

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin dga' ba'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin dga' ba'o //
translated: The Blessed One is the innate joy.

original: nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because of the nature of space.

original: yang na thams cad la khyab pa'i phyir zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: yang na thams cad la khyab pa'i phyir zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: Or else, because of pervading everything, that is the intention.

original: de ni mchog gi gsang chen po //
analyzed: de ni mchog gi gsang chen po //
translated: That is the supreme great secret.

original: thams cad rgyud kyi don snying po //
analyzed: thams cad rgyud kyi don snying po //
translated: The essence of the meaning of all tantras.

original: mchog gi bla ma mngon par gces //
analyzed: mchog gi bla ma mngon par gces //
translated: Cherish the supreme guru.

original: ye shes bdud rtsi rgya mtsho'o //
analyzed: ye shes bdud rtsi rgya mtsho'o //
translated: The ocean of the nectar of wisdom.

original: dri med bdag gis bshad pa yis //
analyzed: dri med bdag gis bshad pa yis //
translated: By my explanation of the stainless,

original: gang zhig 'bras mchog dge ba rnyed //
analyzed: gang zhig 'bras mchog dge ba rnyed //
translated: Whoever attains the supreme virtuous result,

original: srid pa'i sgrog gis bcings pa la //
analyzed: srid pa'i sgrog gis bcings pa la //
translated: Bound by the fetters of existence,🔽May they go to liberation.🔽For the purpose of remembering myself,🔽For the wonder of the wise,

original: de yis grol bar 'gro bar shog / bdag nyid dran pa'i don phyir dang // mkhas pa ya mtshan 'gyur ba dang // slob ma dga' ba'i don gyi phyir //
analyzed: de yis grol bar 'gro bar shog / bdag nyid dran pa'i don phyir dang // mkhas pa ya mtshan 'gyur ba dang // slob ma dga' ba'i don gyi phyir //
translated: And for the purpose of delighting the disciples,

original: bdag gis rin chen snye ma byas //
analyzed: bdag gis rin chen snye ma byas //
translated: I have made this precious garland.

original: rgya gar gyi slob dpon chen po shr'i gupta'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa /
analyzed: rgya gar gyi slob dpon chen po shr'i gupta'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa /
translated: Composed by the great Indian master Śrīgupta.

original: dpal rin po che'i snye ma zhes bya ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so /
analyzed: dpal rin po che'i snye ma zhes bya ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so /
translated: The commentary called The Precious Jewel Garland is complete.

original: // / nyid kyi zhal snga nas mdzad cing gtan la phab pa'o /
analyzed: // / nyid kyi zhal snga nas mdzad cing gtan la phab pa'o /
translated: It was composed and finalized by the master himself.
